title: Create car shop app with loading screen and product gallery

requirements.text: Display a loading screen when the app first launches before showing the main content

quotes: first enter phase a loading screen is showing

acceptanceCriteria: Loading screen appears immediately on app launch
Loading screen transitions to main content after a brief delay
Loading animation or indicator is visible during the loading phase

requirements.text: Create a photo gallery displaying images of cars and car engines on the main screen

quotes: second screen my photos of car and engine of cars

acceptanceCriteria: Images are clearly visible and properly formatted
Gallery layout is organized and easy to navigate

requirements.text: Display purchase information with 'Buy' text and price below each car photo in the gallery

quotes: in down side write like buy the and the price

acceptanceCriteria: Each car listing shows 'Buy' text below the photo
Price is displayed below each car photo
Purchase information is clearly readable and positioned at the bottom of each item

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive automotive showroom design theme with premium styling, clean layout, and professional presentation suitable for a car dealership
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme reflects automotive industry aesthetics
Typography and colors create a premium, professional appearance
Layout emphasizes product photography and clear pricing information
Design remains consistent across loading screen and gallery views

constraints: Use only React, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn components for the frontend
Do not modify immutable paths including useInternetIdentity hooks and ui components

required: Luxury sports car front view in showroom lighting, professional automotive photography style (car-1.dim_800x600.png)
